display.title: Tungsten Chain
description: This quest will cover the Tungsten Chain. &&aTungsten&&r is obtained from either &&eTungstate&&r or &&eScheelite&&r, which are part of the same vein in the End.
Just like the &&dRutile&&r chain, you will only need to input one item type, and everything else will be looped perfectly!
&&9-&&r One &&3Chemical Reactor&&r, to loop &&dHydrogen&&r and &&dChlorine&&r back into &&aHydrochloric Acid&&r.
You will be granted either Calcium or Lithium as a byproduct - it's on the house!
&&l&&3Lore:&&r&&o In GTCE, Tungstate or Scheelite took 40sec and 4,000mB of Hydrogen @ 1920 EU/t to electrolyze into 1 Tungsten Dust. Even if it was simpler, it was much more expensive!
